# Benefique Tax & Accounting

## Overview
Benefique Tax & Accounting is a full-service accounting and fractional CFO firm specializing in tax planning, bookkeeping, and financial strategy for healthcare providers and service-based small businesses.

## Services
- **Fractional CFO Services**: Monthly financial strategy, real-time bookkeeping, cash flow forecasting
- **Tax Planning & Preparation**: Proactive tax optimization, S-corp elections, entity structure planning
- **Full-Service Accounting**: Monthly closes, financial reporting, tax compliance
- **Healthcare Focus**: Specialized in healthcare SMBs, medical practices, clinical services, diagnostic centers

## Core Philosophy
"History matters, but preparation wins." We focus on real-time financial visibility, monthly closes, and decision-ready dashboards.

## Target Clients
- Healthcare practices and diagnostic centers
- Service-based SMBs (consulting, professional services)
- Businesses seeking fractional CFO services
- Companies wanting proactive tax planning vs. reactive filing

## Key Features
- 24-hour response times
- Monthly financial closes
- Real-time bookkeeping systems
- Customized tax strategies
- Experienced Enrolled Agent (EA) leadership

## Location
Davie, Florida

## Website
www.benefique.com
